products.name: Jordan 1 Shattered Backboard Low
products.description: The Jordan 1 Low Shattered Backboard features a black nubuck leather upper with white and orange leather overlays. From there, the black suede lining around the forefoot and the orange leather heel with an Air Jordan Wings logo stitched into the middle complete the design.
